dups()

Helps you find duplicates used in schema_to_yaml.rb for cleanup

[ show source ]

   # File lib/restfulx/rails/schema_to_yaml/extensions/enumerable.rb, line 5
5:   def dups
6:     inject({}) {|h,v| h[v]=h[v].to_i+1; h}.reject{|k,v| v==1}.keys
7:   end
